\section*{\begin{picture}(20,0) \put(-5,-10){\includegraphics*[width=1cm]{/www/erowid.org/experiences/images/erologo_1cm_600dpi_greyscale}} \end{picture} Erowid Experience Vaults Report Id: 66051}

\subsection*{Cheap and Easy}
\vspace{-0.2cm}
by \emph{helter}
\vspace{0.5cm}
\thispagestyle{plain}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|c|c|c|}
\hline
Dose:  T+ 0:00 &   & inhaled & Carbon Dioxide & gas\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{1mm}

\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|}
\hline
Body weight: & 120.00 lbs\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{2mm}
one fine day i felt the need for a buzz. my friend told me i could get a buzz from a half drunk 2 liter coke bottle by shaking it so co2 builds up. then slowly remove the lid and inhale and hold for 10 seconds. so i tried it it was hard to inhale and hold my breath when i exhaled gasping for breath i felt a very strong buzz sort of a bit of panic and very strong Euphoria only lasted about 30 seconds.
